title.narrative: HUMAN RESOURCES MANAGEMENT

description.narrative: Human Resources Management, which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Pregnant women, newborns and young children, especially the most vulnerable, benefit from quality neonatal, child health, HIV, nutrition and sanitation services, including in emergency situations

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERIO DO TRABALHO SOLIDARIEDAD FAMILIA E PROTECAO SOCIAL

sector.narrative: Management and Operations support at CO

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Human Resources Management

description.narrative: The well-being and development of staff in a respectful,;motivating;and safe working environment, particularly during this period of COVID;19;is essential for the implementation of;programme;activities. Thus, in 2021 like in 2020, the office&39;s priority in supporting its human resources will focus on staff well-being and career development.;;Key;results are;as follows:;staff well-being,;career development,;recruitment;and implementation of Global Staff Survey (GSS) action plan implementation.;;Performance of human resources in combination with learning and training has been;duly;supported and recruitments have been conducted;timely;and effectively. Staff entitlements were closely;monitored,;timely;action, adequate support and guidance was provided to all staff accordingly.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/12/2021
